title: SalTrend Witch Zeitals 6/28: Hocus Pocus 2, Trump, Barbie, R. Kelly, Ghislane Maxwell, MGK, Megan Fox
itunes:title: SalTrend Witch Zeitals 6/28: Hocus Pocus 2, Trump, Barbie, R. Kelly, Ghislane Maxwell, MGK, Megan Fox
description:
In this edition of The SalTrend Witch Zeitals, Jack and super producer Becca discuss the trailer for 'Hocus Pocus 2', EVEN MOAR of Trumps' 1/6 antics being revealed, new stills from the set of 'Barbie', an R. Kelly fan arrested for plotting to storm the prosecutor's office to prevent sentencing, Ghislane Maxwell actually being sentenced, and "real-life rock & roll Ken and Barbie" MGK and Megan Fox!
